tool_description: An all around sms API for sending messages all over the world www.smsapiguru.com
name: SmsGuru
title: SmsGuru

api_list.name: Check code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smsguru1.p.rapidapi.com/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smsguru1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send SMS
api_list.description: Send a text message to any number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smsguru1.p.rapidapi.com/sms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smsguru1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
